root.name: LocoRoco Midnight Carnival
root.description: Story This Loco Roco game,which is only for download, takes part in an new adventure alongside the Bui Bui team. Also there are more new features to find on levels, minigames, and more! Download only LocoRoco Midnight Carnival is an download only available on the Playstation Network (PSN)

similar_games.game: Rolando 2: Quest for the Golden Orchid
